messages.messageBody:
OMG! After the week I've had this just touched off the funny bone
and has turned the weekend around!! Thank you!

This is definitely going out to all my close buds...

Thanks, again!

Ginger

rotflmao....that's the best thing I've seen all week.
Hm, how to talk the kids into building a horse?
Melissa

(3), and Avari Rose
